title: Banthar's Go-SDL package was broken by a change to exp/gui
body:
by **girard.m1**: 
Mercurial's changeset 10542:1fcb3b9a776a by Nigel Tao <nigeltao@golang.org>
removes exp/gui not just exp/gui/x11, this breaks Go-SDL since it makes uses of
exp/gui/gui.go

The file "exp/gui/gui.go" is pretty generic. I think Banthar was right to
reuse that file.
